remarks: The image of a group homomorphism from ` G ` to ` H ` is a subgroup of ` H ` .  (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 25-Feb-2008.)
statement:
ghomgrp.1 $e |- Y = ran F $.
ghomgrp.2 $e |- S = ( H |` ( Y X. Y ) ) $.
ghomgrp $p |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ H e. GrpOp /\ F e. ( G GrpOpHom H ) ) -> S e. ( SubGrpOp ` H ) ) $.
